name: Aditya
greetingText: I really like your name btw! more like your surname coz it matches mine!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: To my favorite gamer and footballer,Happy Birthday!
replayText: I really hope you realise how special you are and how you deserve every effort I put! ;)
